one of the main goals that I'm trying to
do with this book is to explain the
fundamentals behind those quantum
algorithms that are created by those
white mathematicians and how developers
can benefit from these concepts I think
it's extremely hard to come up with
completely new quantum algorithms if you
think about it there are only a few
known popular quantum algorithms people
that are in quantum computing for a
while they will know Shor's algorithm go
over those josa
and a few others but they're not too
many of them so and that's what I want
to make it clear if you're a developer
do not expect that you will tomorrow
create your totally new quantum
algorithm but those quantum algorithms
are based on some concepts that might be
applicable to your particular
application
